body_html:
I used win7, Python3.6/TF 1.4m, which has this problem, I am trying Ubuntu, Python2.7 and TF1.4, hope this can be ok.

@flrngel I used a user defined initial state in dynamic rnn, but have the problem
init_s = rnn_cell.zero_state(batch_size=BATCH_SIZE, dtype=tf.float32)
outputs, final_s = tf.nn.dynamic_rnn(
rnn_cell,
data,
initial_state=init_s,
time_major=False,
)

body:
I used win7, Python3.6/TF 1.4m, which has this problem, I am trying Ubuntu, Python2.7 and TF1.4, hope this can be ok.

@flrngel I used a user defined initial state in dynamic rnn, but have the problem 
init_s = rnn_cell.zero_state(batch_size=BATCH_SIZE, dtype=tf.float32)  
    outputs, final_s = tf.nn.dynamic_rnn(
        rnn_cell,  
        data,
        initial_state=init_s,  
        time_major=False, 
    )
